modName: Bloodskal plate - A nordic carved retexture
summary: A standalone retexture of nordic carved armor, featuring a gold surface with blood-soaked fur and markings, as well as spatters of blood on various places.
descriptionHtml:
This is a standalone retexture of nordic carved armor. It is craftable and temperable, it requires a piece of nordic carved plus some gold bars and a few heartstones. This is because it is about 20% higher than nordic carved stats wise. Tempering it also requires a heartstone. 

(((REQIURES DRAGONBORN))) 

It features a gold colored surface with blood-soaked fur and various markings in blood, as well as blood spatters on the armor/leather pieces. This is my second mod, so please leave some feedback, and i hope you enjoy it. 

If there is a demand for a matching bloodskal blade, i can make one. 

Special thanks to lateraliss for his wonderful tutorial on how to make things standalone located here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6677

I\'m quite sure his is the only tutorial on the subject out there atm.
author: Nephutis
